subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Luke Donald birdied six straight holes, and one-putted nine straight greens from No. 8 through No. 17, making long putts and close ones to win at Muirfield Village Golf Club.
snippet: Luke Donald birdied six straight holes, and one-putted nine straight greens from No. 8 through No. 17, making long putts and close ones to win at Muirfield Village Golf Club.
